data.eml:eml: Adenopygus: a new genus and two new species of Luzarinae cricket of Brazilian Atlantic Forest (Orthoptera: Grylloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolfarini, Marcio P., De, Francisco De A. G. (2012): Adenopygus: a new genus and two new species of Luzarinae cricket of Brazilian Atlantic Forest (Orthoptera: Grylloidea). Zootaxa 3303: 37-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210622
